strings: <voice_0x01001D16><se_high>Princess Medea: Isn't it extraordinary that Marcello of all people came to our aid?
<voice_0x01001D17><se_high>Princess Medea: I can safely say that our encounters with him until now did not leave me with a positive impression of the man.

<voice_0x01001D18><se_high>Princess Medea: Quite the opposite, in fact.
He IMPRISONED you. Twice!

<voice_0x01001D19><se_high>Princess Medea: .........
I didn't mention it at the time, but...
<voice_0x01001D1A><se_high>Princess Medea: I noticed him following us when we came to the wasteland.

<voice_0x01001D1B><se_high>Princess Medea: Every now and then, he would stop and
double over.
<voice_0x01001D1C><se_high>Princess Medea: I can't be certain, but I suspect the injury he sustained in Neos hasn't fully healed.
<voice_0x01001D1D><se_high>Princess Medea: Which makes me wonder: why would he take such pains to follow us like that?
<voice_0x01001D1E><se_high>Princess Medea: Perhaps he does care about Angelo, after all... Could it be that all those things he said on the Holy Isle were just for show?
<voice_0x01001D1F><se_high>Princess Medea: I know that a lot has happened between them, but I wish those two could find it in themselves to make peace with one another.
<voice_0x01001D20><se_high>Princess Medea: After all, they're the only family each of them has in this world.
